hk.ust.comp4321.database

Class PageInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • hk.ust.comp4321.database.PageInfo

  • public class PageInfo
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PageInfo(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String title, int size, java.util.Date lastModificationDate)
      This constrcutor encapsulates the url, the title, the size in bytes and the last modification date of a page.
